name: The Old Reader Vertical Tablet Style
description: Increase usability for tablet in vertical position
additional_info:
DUE RECENTLY CHANGES THIS STYLE SEEMS NOT TO BE WORKING CORRECTLY, PLEASE WAIT FOR A NEW RELEASE

This is an yet under developing layout for using The Old Reader on a tablet in a vertical position.
Until now it was only tested on 7 inch tablet and is not yet perfected.
The usability seems a lot better already anyway.

The controls was moved to the bottom of the page and the side menu to the top.
It will only show feeds grouped and the menu slides horizontally.
